1NT.DU.summary: Valara Capital AG is based in Rosengarten, Germany.

AO9.MU.summary: BACKBONE Technology AG, through its subsidiaries, provides data analysis, forensics, and cyber defense solutions in Europe. It offers forensic services for the identification and detection of illegal and reputation-damaging processes in data networks and the Internet. The company also develops and distributes solutions for the secure use and management of content in data networks and forensic technologies with artificial intelligence. The company is based in Hamburg, Germany.

AOF.DE.summary: ATOSS Software AG develops and sells workforce management software in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, and internationally. It also provides software maintenance, hardware, and consulting services relating to the provision of electronic support for various corporate processes involved in the deployment of personnel resources at business enterprises and public institutions. The company's solutions include Crewmeister, an online time recording and holiday planning solution for start-ups and small businesses; ATOSS Time Control, a software solution for time and attendance management, and workforce scheduling for small to medium-sized customers, as well as large decentralized organizations; and ATOSS Staff Efficiency Suite for integrated workforce management, time management, self services, mobile apps, workforce forecasting, deployment planning or strategic capacity, and demand and planning. It also provides sector-specific solutions, including call center, hospitality, logistics, manufacturing, medial, and retail sectors; cloud solutions; solutions for SAP; and mobile solutions, as well as ATOSS Solution Finder, which enables to identify software for companies. In addition, the company offers software implementation and training services; and sells software licenses, hardware, and identification media for time recording and assess control modules. It serves customers in the manufacturing and production, healthcare and social services, retail and chain stores, hospitality, logistics and transportation, and service industries. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Munich, Germany.

AOF.F.summary: ATOSS Software AG develops and sells workforce management software in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, and internationally. It also provides software maintenance, hardware, and consulting services relating to the provision of electronic support for various corporate processes involved in the deployment of personnel resources at business enterprises and public institutions. The company's solutions include Crewmeister, an online time recording and holiday planning solution for start-ups and small businesses; ATOSS Time Control, a software solution for time and attendance management, and workforce scheduling for small to medium-sized customers, as well as large decentralized organizations; and ATOSS Staff Efficiency Suite for integrated workforce management, time management, self services, mobile apps, workforce forecasting, deployment planning or strategic capacity, and demand and planning. It also provides sector-specific solutions, including call center, hospitality, logistics, manufacturing, medial, and retail sectors; cloud solutions; solutions for SAP; and mobile solutions, as well as ATOSS Solution Finder, which enables to identify software for companies. In addition, the company offers software implementation and training services; and sells software licenses, hardware, and identification media for time recording and assess control modules. It serves customers in the manufacturing and production, healthcare and social services, retail and chain stores, hospitality, logistics and transportation, and service industries. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Munich, Germany.

BSS.F.summary: Beta Systems Software AG develops software products in Germany and internationally. It offers identity access management solutions, such as identity and password management solutions; user, recertification, and process center solutions; access intelligence solutions; and data access governance solutions. The company also provides data center intelligence solutions, including output management and document archiving, workload automation, log management, quality management, service and change management, access rights management, and IT operations management solutions. Beta Systems Software AG was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Berlin, Germany.

BWQ.DE.summary: Advanced Blockchain AG focuses on the creation, development, and implementation of distributed ledger technology software for companies. It also offers consultation services to companies. The company is based in Berlin, Germany.

BWQ.DU.summary: Advanced Blockchain AG focuses on the creation, development, and implementation of distributed ledger technology software for companies. It also offers consultation services to companies. The company is based in Berlin, Germany.

BWQ.F.summary: Advanced Blockchain AG focuses on the creation, development, and implementation of distributed ledger technology software for companies. It also offers consultation services to companies. The company is based in Berlin, Germany.

CPU2.F.summary: CPU Softwarehouse AG provides IT services and software solutions for banks, bank-related institutes, industries, and IT and telecommunications companies in Germany, Austria, and Switzerland. The company offers CPU Investment Advisor, an investment software; CPU Value Mirror, a banking controlling software; and CPU credit, a loan software for banks. It also provides software development, telecom, and human resources services; consulting services for the conception and implementation of IT projects; and professional and IT services for the banking sector. CPU Softwarehouse AG was founded in 1987 and is based in Augsburg, Germany.

DTD2.DE.summary: B+S Banksysteme Aktiengesellschaft develops and markets software solutions for banks and financial service providers. It offers software solutions in the areas of payments transactions; documentary transaction for import and export letters of credit, import and export debt collection, and guarantees to be borne by the customer and in favor of the customer; account and currency management; treasury; and risk management. The company also provides DDBAC, a banking interface that enables to read bank data, analyze transaction histories, initiate transfers, verify account data, and aggregate several bank accounts; and variety and precious metal trade and e-banking solutions; and banking APIs. In addition, it engages in developing, selling, and maintaining applications; provision of software as a service and data centers. The company primarily serves private, savings, and online banks, as well as industrial companies. B+S Banksysteme Aktiengesellschaft was founded in 1982 and is based in Munich, Germany.

ESY.DE.summary: EASY SOFTWARE AG develops and provides software solutions worldwide. It offers software for various HR processes, such as integrated HR software, including job application management, personnel development, employee self service, and digital personnel file; and SAP HR system, such as SAP ESS and MSS, SAP HR department, digital personnel file SAP, job reference, SAP compliance-management, and SAP processes forms document generation software. The company also provides and procurement processes ECM, such as accounts payable, purchase requisition, and contract management software; and procurement process SAP comprises invoice processing, procurement, and contract management software. In addition, it provides master data management in SAP, such as change management, customer master data system, material management, and service request management software for efficient management of SAP master data and services; and document management software, including document entry, archiving, electronic files, workflow, email archiving, and integration and interface software. Further, the company offers multi-experience services, such as multi-experience platform, Software as a Service, and private cloud software; and EASY software for SAP. Additionally, it offers consulting, managed, support, and EASY academy services. EASY SOFTWARE AG was founded in 1990 and is based in MÃ¼lheim an der Ruhr, Germany.

ESY.F.summary: EASY SOFTWARE AG develops and provides software solutions worldwide. It offers software for various HR processes, such as integrated HR software, including job application management, personnel development, employee self service, and digital personnel file; and SAP HR system, such as SAP ESS and MSS, SAP HR department, digital personnel file SAP, job reference, SAP compliance-management, and SAP processes forms document generation software. The company also provides and procurement processes ECM, such as accounts payable, purchase requisition, and contract management software; and procurement process SAP comprises invoice processing, procurement, and contract management software. In addition, it provides master data management in SAP, such as change management, customer master data system, material management, and service request management software for efficient management of SAP master data and services; and document management software, including document entry, archiving, electronic files, workflow, email archiving, and integration and interface software. Further, the company offers multi-experience services, such as multi-experience platform, Software as a Service, and private cloud software; and EASY software for SAP. Additionally, it offers consulting, managed, support, and EASY academy services. EASY SOFTWARE AG was founded in 1990 and is based in MÃ¼lheim an der Ruhr, Germany.

EXL.DE.summary: Exasol AG, a technology company, develops database for analytics and data warehousing worldwide. Its products include Exasol Community Edition, a database solution for commercial and private/academic use; Exasol One, a database that manages up to 1TB of data on a single node for small and medium-sized businesses or individual departments within enterprise organizations; and Exasol Enterprise Cluster, a database solution that provides scalability and enterprise-level support. The company also offers cloud analytics, business intelligence (BI) acceleration, BI to data analytics, analytics on big data, enterprise data warehousing, and data science solutions; and professional services, such as operations support, product support and consulting, and training services. It provides solutions for retail, financial, and sports analytics. Exasol AG was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Nuremberg, Germany.

EXL.F.summary: Exasol AG, a technology company, develops database for analytics and data warehousing worldwide. Its products include Exasol Community Edition, a database solution for commercial and private/academic use; Exasol One, a database that manages up to 1TB of data on a single node for small and medium-sized businesses or individual departments within enterprise organizations; and Exasol Enterprise Cluster, a database solution that provides scalability and enterprise-level support. The company also offers cloud analytics, business intelligence (BI) acceleration, BI to data analytics, analytics on big data, enterprise data warehousing, and data science solutions; and professional services, such as operations support, product support and consulting, and training services. It provides solutions for retail, financial, and sports analytics. Exasol AG was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Nuremberg, Germany.

FBEN.DE.summary: Fyber N.V. operating as a technology company in the field of in-app advertising in the United States, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, the Asia Pacific, and internationally. The company's platform, Fyber FairBid, an independent monetization platform for app developers and mobile publishers. It also offers Fyber Marketplace, a programmatic ad exchange for the in-app environment; and Wall Edge, an opt-in, value-exchange ad format that is primarily used within gaming apps. The company was formerly known as RNTS Media N.V. and changed its name to Fyber N.V. in June 2017. Fyber N.V. was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Berlin, Germany.

FBEN.F.summary: Fyber N.V. operating as a technology company in the field of in-app advertising in the United States, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, the Asia Pacific, and internationally. The company's platform, Fyber FairBid, an independent monetization platform for app developers and mobile publishers. It also offers Fyber Marketplace, a programmatic ad exchange for the in-app environment; and Wall Edge, an opt-in, value-exchange ad format that is primarily used within gaming apps. The company was formerly known as RNTS Media N.V. and changed its name to Fyber N.V. in June 2017. Fyber N.V. was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Berlin, Germany.

GKS.DE.summary: GK Software SE provides retail sector software worldwide. The company offers OmniPOS solution for point of sale; Mobile POS that enables to deploy mobile retail concepts; Open Scale, a paradigm shift for various retail companies that uses scales; Lean Store Server to centralize and scale various back-office servers; Enterprise Store Manager to manage store network; and Enterprise Cockpit that offers a visualization of the retail organization. It also provides Enterprise Promotions Management, a solution for designing and managing company-wide promotions and special offers; Stored Value Server, a centralized voucher database; Digital Content Management, a centralized software for transmitting content to devices across the retail organization; Sales Cockpit; Self-Checkout, an optional GK/Retail POS solution; and Mobile Consumer Assistant. In addition, the company's GK/Retail suite consists of Store Device Control, a solution for the management of store peripherals; mobile store merchandise management processes solution; Label & Poster Print, a software solution for store-level label and poster printing; TransAction+, a payment processing application; and GK Omni-Channel Personalization to enable real-time personalized services for Omni-channel business. It serves the food retail sector, drug stores and household goods, fashion and lifestyle, DIY and furniture, technology, and cars markets. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in SchÃ¶neck, Germany. GK Software SE is a subsidiary of GK Software Holding GmbH.

GKS.F.summary: GK Software SE provides retail sector software worldwide. The company offers OmniPOS solution for point of sale; Mobile POS that enables to deploy mobile retail concepts; Open Scale, a paradigm shift for various retail companies that uses scales; Lean Store Server to centralize and scale various back-office servers; Enterprise Store Manager to manage store network; and Enterprise Cockpit that offers a visualization of the retail organization. It also provides Enterprise Promotions Management, a solution for designing and managing company-wide promotions and special offers; Stored Value Server, a centralized voucher database; Digital Content Management, a centralized software for transmitting content to devices across the retail organization; Sales Cockpit; Self-Checkout, an optional GK/Retail POS solution; and Mobile Consumer Assistant. In addition, the company's GK/Retail suite consists of Store Device Control, a solution for the management of store peripherals; mobile store merchandise management processes solution; Label & Poster Print, a software solution for store-level label and poster printing; TransAction+, a payment processing application; and GK Omni-Channel Personalization to enable real-time personalized services for Omni-channel business. It serves the food retail sector, drug stores and household goods, fashion and lifestyle, DIY and furniture, technology, and cars markets. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in SchÃ¶neck, Germany. GK Software SE is a subsidiary of GK Software Holding GmbH.

IVU.DE.summary: IVU Traffic Technologies AG offers IVU integrated products for bus and rail companies' processes, including planning, dispatching, and operations controls to ticketing, passenger information, and the settlement of transport contracts worldwide. It provides IVU.suite, which plan routes, inform passengers, provide connections, control traffic signals, dispatch drivers, monitor fleets, sell tickets, and merge data; IVU.suite for electric buses that provides service planning, resource planning, dispatching, fleet management, ticketing, passenger information, and controlling; IVU.rail, which supports railway companies with various operational tasks, including timetable planning and run scheduling, dispatching rolling stock and staff, fleet management and passenger information, and management of transport contracts; and IVU.cloud, a Software-as-a-Service solution for acquiring, operating, and maintaining server systems. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Berlin, Germany.

IVU.F.summary: IVU Traffic Technologies AG offers IVU integrated products for bus and rail companies' processes, including planning, dispatching, and operations controls to ticketing, passenger information, and the settlement of transport contracts worldwide. It provides IVU.suite, which plan routes, inform passengers, provide connections, control traffic signals, dispatch drivers, monitor fleets, sell tickets, and merge data; IVU.suite for electric buses that provides service planning, resource planning, dispatching, fleet management, ticketing, passenger information, and controlling; IVU.rail, which supports railway companies with various operational tasks, including timetable planning and run scheduling, dispatching rolling stock and staff, fleet management and passenger information, and management of transport contracts; and IVU.cloud, a Software-as-a-Service solution for acquiring, operating, and maintaining server systems. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Berlin, Germany.

IVX.DE.summary: InVision Aktiengesellschaft develops and markets products and services in the field of workforce management and education in Europe and the United States. Its products include injixo, a cloud-based workforce management software to optimize workforce planning process; and The Call Center School, a cloud-based e-learning solution. It serves contact centers, small businesses, and large corporations. The company was formerly known as InVision Software AG and changed its name to InVision Aktiengesellschaft in August 2012. InVision Aktiengesellschaft was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in DÃ¼sseldorf, Germany.

IVX.F.summary: InVision Aktiengesellschaft develops and markets products and services in the field of workforce management and education in Europe and the United States. Its products include injixo, a cloud-based workforce management software to optimize workforce planning process; and The Call Center School, a cloud-based e-learning solution. It serves contact centers, small businesses, and large corporations. The company was formerly known as InVision Software AG and changed its name to InVision Aktiengesellschaft in August 2012. InVision Aktiengesellschaft was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in DÃ¼sseldorf, Germany.

MSGL.HM.summary: msg life ag provides software, advice, and cloud solutions for life insurance companies and pension fund institutions in Europe and the United States. The company offers msg.Insurance Suite for digitized insurance business; msg.Health Factory that covers life cycle of a health insurance contract; msg.ILIS, an insurance liability information system; msg.Life Group for collective business; msg.Life Factory for life insurance companies; msg.Pension portal for time value accounts and company pension plans; msg.Marsy-Pension for company pension commitments; msg.Ran, a pension settlement and documentation system; msg.Tax Connect, a software to optimize tax communication procedures; msg.Zulagenverwaltung for automated management of allowances processes; msg.ZVK Factory, a policy administration system for supplementary pension fund; and msg.Tax Data for automated management of tax exemption orders and non-assessment certificates. It also provides msg. P&C Factory, a policy administration system for P&C insurance companies; msg.Billing collects and settles process; msg.Business Partner, a software for management of individuals and legal entities; msg.Commission controls and manages the sales structure; msg.Office, a digitized transaction control and document management solution; and msg.PMQ, a product management system. In addition, the company offers msg.Migration Archive, a software for archiving of historical contract data and peripheral system data; msg.Migration System that manages the transformation of data between the policy administration systems autonomously; msg.Sales platform for digital quotation and application processing; and msg.Online Insure, a customer self-service portal. Further, it offers the Unified Administration Platform; Unified Product Platform for Health; UAP.Reinsurance system; and Unified Distribution Platform. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Leinfelden-Echterdingen, Germany. msg life ag is a subsidiary of msg systems ag.

MUM.DE.summary: Mensch und Maschine Software SE provides computer aided design, manufacturing, and engineering (CAD/CAM/CAE), product data management, and building information modeling/management solutions in Germany and internationally. It operates in two segments, VAR Business and M+M Software. The VAR Business segment sells CAD software to end users, as well as provides associated services. The M+M Software segments engages in the development of CAD/CAM/CAE software. The company offers software solutions that are used for the process control of milling, drilling, and turning in various industries, such as mechanical engineering; tool, mold, and die making; automotive and aerospace industry; medical technology; and toy industry, as well as watch, clock, and jewelry manufacturing. Mensch und Maschine Software SE was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Starnberg, Germany.

MUM.F.summary: Mensch und Maschine Software SE provides computer aided design, manufacturing, and engineering (CAD/CAM/CAE), product data management, and building information modeling/management solutions in Germany and internationally. It operates in two segments, VAR Business and M+M Software. The VAR Business segment sells CAD software to end users, as well as provides associated services. The M+M Software segments engages in the development of CAD/CAM/CAE software. The company offers software solutions that are used for the process control of milling, drilling, and turning in various industries, such as mechanical engineering; tool, mold, and die making; automotive and aerospace industry; medical technology; and toy industry, as well as watch, clock, and jewelry manufacturing. Mensch und Maschine Software SE was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Starnberg, Germany.

N4G.DE.short_name: THE NAGA GROUP AG NA O.N.
N4G.DE.summary: The NAGA Group AG focuses on the development, marketing, and growth of disruptive applications for financial technology. Its products include NAGA Trader, the social network for traders; NAGA Brokers, a place where users can learn to trade through live and online events and Webinars; NAGA Virtual, a market place where gamers can monetize their game time; NAGA Wallet, an entry points to the world of cryptocurrencies; and NAGA Markets to trade with an EU licensed brokerage company. The company also offers NAGA Cybo, an AI robo-advisor to take care of investments; NAGA Academy for professional crypto, forex, and trading courses, seminars, and live Webinars; NAGA Exchange for cryptocurrencies exchange; NAGA Partners; NAGA Guard; and NAGA Card. The NAGA Group AG has various new products in the final stages of development, including NAGA Wealth, NAGA Local, and, NAGA Stocks. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Hamburg, Germany.

NEM.DE.summary: Nemetschek SE provides software solutions for architecture, engineering, construction, media, and entertainment markets worldwide. It operates through four segments: Design, Build, Manage, and Media & Entertainment. The Design segment offers software solutions primarily under the Allplan, Graphisoft, Solibri, Precast, Vectorworks, SCIA, dRofus, Data Design System, Frilo, and RISA brands for architects, designers, engineers, structural engineers, specialist planners, and landscape designers, as well as developers and general contractors. This segment provides building information modeling solutions for computer aided design and computer aided engineering in 2D and 3D building design and imaging. The Build segment offers commercial software solutions primarily under the Nevaris, Bluebeam, and SDS/2 brands that support bidding and awarding, invoicing, budgeting, scheduling, and cost calculation. This segment serves construction companies, developers, building supplies, and general contractors, as well as planning offices, architects, and civil engineers. The Manage segment provides commercial property management services under the Crem brand; and integrated software solutions for property, facility, and workplace management under the Spacewell brand for facility and property managers, banks, and insurance and property companies. The Media & Entertainment segment offers software solutions under the Maxon name for rendering 3D modeling, animation, and visual effects that are used in film, television, advertising, and video game productions, as well as in medicine, product design, and infographics. Nemetschek SE was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Munich, Germany.

NEM.F.summary: Nemetschek SE provides software solutions for architecture, engineering, construction, media, and entertainment markets worldwide. It operates through four segments: Design, Build, Manage, and Media & Entertainment. The Design segment offers software solutions primarily under the Allplan, Graphisoft, Solibri, Precast, Vectorworks, SCIA, dRofus, Data Design System, Frilo, and RISA brands for architects, designers, engineers, structural engineers, specialist planners, and landscape designers, as well as developers and general contractors. This segment serves construction companies, developers, building supplies, and general contractors, as well as planning offices, architects, and civil engineers. The Manage segment provides commercial property management services under the Crem brand; and integrated software solutions for property, facility, and workplace management under the Spacewell brand for facility and property managers, banks, and insurance and property companies. The Media & Entertainment segment offers software solutions under the Maxon name for rendering 3D modeling, animation, and visual effects that are used in film, television, advertising, and video game productions, as well as in medicine, product design, and infographics. Nemetschek SE was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Munich, Germany.

The Manage segment provides commercial property management services under the Crem brand; and integrated software solutions for property, facility, and workplace management under the Spacewell brand for facility and property managers, banks, and insurance and property companies. Nemetschek SE was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Munich, Germany.

NIIN.DE.summary: niiio finance group AG provides software-as-a-service solutions for banks and financial service providers. It offers cloud services from portfolio management systems to robo-advisors, as well as banking API suite. The company is based in GÃ¶rlitz, Germany.

NIIN.F.summary: niiio finance group AG provides software-as-a-service solutions for banks and financial service providers. It offers cloud services from portfolio management systems to robo-advisors, as well as banking API suite. The company is based in GÃ¶rlitz, Germany.

PAQ3.MU.summary: ISRA Vision Parsytec AG supplies and installs surface inspection systems primarily to metal and paper producers in Germany and internationally. The company offers SURFACE MASTER, a tool to perform continuous process and production optimization along the production chain in metals production; and PAPER MASTER, a Web inspection system that finds, analyzes, and classifies defects in the pulp and paper industry. It also provides turn-key surface inspection systems for the automotive, plastic, glass, nonwovens, print, solar and photovoltaic, and film and foil industries. The company is based in Aachen, Germany. ISRA Vision Parsytec AG is a subsidiary of Isra Vision AG.

PSAN.DE.summary: PSI Software AG develops and sells software systems and products for the energy supply, production, infrastructure, software technology, internet applications, and business consultancy sectors worldwide. The company operates through two segments, Energy Management and Production Management. The Energy Management segment provides intelligent solutions for utility companies in the electricity, gas, oil, and water sectors, as well as for the district heating sector. It develops control systems for electrical grids, cross-sector control systems, and gas and pipeline management systems; and solutions for energy trading, energy distribution, virtual power plants, power plant optimization, and gas industry planning. The Production Management segment offers software products and solutions for planning and controlling production processes in raw material extraction, metal production, logistics, mechanical engineering, and automotive manufacturing. The company also offers a range of data processing services; sells electronic equipment; and operates data processing systems. PSI Software AG was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Berlin, Germany.

PSAN.F.summary: PSI Software AG develops and sells software systems and products for the energy supply, production, infrastructure, software technology, internet applications, and business consultancy sectors worldwide. The company operates through two segments, Energy Management and Production Management. The Energy Management segment provides intelligent solutions for utility companies in the electricity, gas, oil, and water sectors, as well as for the district heating sector. It develops control systems for electrical grids, cross-sector control systems, and gas and pipeline management systems; and solutions for energy trading, energy distribution, virtual power plants, power plant optimization, and gas industry planning. The Production Management segment offers software products and solutions for planning and controlling production processes in raw material extraction, metal production, logistics, mechanical engineering, and automotive manufacturing. The company also offers a range of data processing services; sells electronic equipment; and operates data processing systems. PSI Software AG was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Berlin, Germany.

QS6A.SG.summary: Q-Soft Verwaltungs AG operates as an investment company. The company is based in Gechingen, Germany.

RIBU.F.summary: RIB Software SE creates, develops, and sells software solutions for the construction enterprises and projects across various industries worldwide. Its solutions include iTWO Civil, a CAD software for highway, earthwork, and sewer construction; iTWO e-tendering platform that provides e-business and e-tendering solutions for construction and supply services; and RIBTEC, an integrated software that enables structural engineers in structural designing of building and ground engineering, finite element calculation, and tunnel and bridge construction, as well as drawing of formwork and reinforcement plans. The company also provides project consultancy support services, and software maintenance. RIB Software SE has a strategic alliance with Microsoft to establish a vertical cloud platform MTWO for the construction and real estate industries. The company was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Stuttgart, Germany. As of July 10, 2020, RIB Software SE operates as a subsidiary of Schneider Electric Investment AG.

RSTAY.summary: RIB Software SE creates, develops, and sells software solutions for the construction enterprises and projects across various industries worldwide. Its solutions include iTWO Civil, a CAD software for highway, earthwork, and sewer construction; iTWO e-tendering platform that provides e-business and e-tendering solutions for construction and supply services; and RIBTEC, an integrated software that enables structural engineers in structural designing of building and ground engineering, finite element calculation, and tunnel and bridge construction, as well as drawing of formwork and reinforcement plans. The company also provides project consultancy support services, and software maintenance. RIB Software SE has a strategic alliance with Microsoft to establish a vertical cloud platform MTWO for the construction and real estate industries. The company was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Stuttgart, Germany. As of July 10, 2020, RIB Software SE operates as a subsidiary of Schneider Electric Investment AG.

SAP.summary: SAP SE operates as an enterprise application software, and analytics and business intelligence company worldwide. The company operates through three segments: Applications, Technology & Services; SAP Business Network; and Customer Experience. It offers SAP HANA, which enables businesses to process and analyze live data; SAP Data Hub, a solution for businesses to manage data from various sources; and SAP Cloud platform that offers an enterprise platform-as-a-service. The company also provides SAP Leonardo, a system that combines design thinking services with intelligent technologies for business processes; SAP Analytics Cloud, which leverages the intersection of business intelligence, planning, and predictive analytics; SAP BW/4HANA, a data warehouse solution; SAP S/4HANA, an enterprise resource planning suite for intelligent enterprises; SAP Integrated Business Planning solutions that deliver real-time supply chain planning capabilities; and SAP Business One, an on-premise and cloud business application. In addition, it offers SAP Fiori, an user experience interface; SAP SuccessFactors Human Capital Management solutions that help organizations enhance the value of their workforce; SAP Fieldglass, a cloud-based application for external workforce management and services procurement; SAP Ariba, an online business-to-business marketplace; and SAP Concur, a travel and expense management software. Further, the company provides SAP MaxAttention to turn ideas into value-based predictable outcomes; and SAP ActiveAttention program to support smaller businesses. Additionally, it offers SAP Enterprise Support services that provides proactive, predictive, and preventive support for customers across hybrid landscapes; and SAP Preferred Success, which provides prescriptive customer success activities for accelerated cloud adoption. SAP SE has strategic alliance with NTT Corporation. SAP SE was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Walldorf, Germany.

SAPA.F.summary: SAP SE operates as an enterprise application software, and analytics and business intelligence company worldwide. The company operates through three segments: Applications, Technology & Services; SAP Business Network; and Customer Experience. It offers SAP HANA, which enables businesses to process and analyze live data; SAP Data Hub, a solution for businesses to manage data from various sources; and SAP Cloud platform that offers an enterprise platform-as-a-service. The company also provides SAP Leonardo, a system that combines design thinking services with intelligent technologies for business processes; SAP Analytics Cloud, which leverages the intersection of business intelligence, planning, and predictive analytics; SAP BW/4HANA, a data warehouse solution; SAP S/4HANA, an enterprise resource planning suite for intelligent enterprises; SAP Integrated Business Planning solutions that deliver real-time supply chain planning capabilities; and SAP Business One, an on-premise and cloud business application. In addition, it offers SAP Fiori, an user experience interface; SAP SuccessFactors Human Capital Management solutions that help organizations enhance the value of their workforce; SAP Fieldglass, a cloud-based application for external workforce management and services procurement; SAP Ariba, an online business-to-business marketplace; and SAP Concur, a travel and expense management software. Further, the company provides SAP MaxAttention to turn ideas into value-based predictable outcomes; and SAP ActiveAttention program to support smaller businesses. Additionally, it offers SAP Enterprise Support services that provides proactive, predictive, and preventive support for customers across hybrid landscapes; and SAP Preferred Success, which provides prescriptive customer success activities for accelerated cloud adoption. SAP SE has strategic alliance with NTT Corporation. SAP SE was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Walldorf, Germany.

SAPGF.summary: SAP SE operates as an enterprise application software, and analytics and business intelligence company worldwide. The company operates through three segments: Applications, Technology & Services; SAP Business Network; and Customer Experience. It offers SAP HANA, which enables businesses to process and analyze live data; SAP Data Hub, a solution for businesses to manage data from various sources; and SAP Cloud platform that offers an enterprise platform-as-a-service. The company also provides SAP Leonardo, a system that combines design thinking services with intelligent technologies for business processes; SAP Analytics Cloud, which leverages the intersection of business intelligence, planning, and predictive analytics; SAP BW/4HANA, a data warehouse solution; SAP S/4HANA, an enterprise resource planning suite for intelligent enterprises; SAP Integrated Business Planning solutions that deliver real-time supply chain planning capabilities; and SAP Business One, an on-premise and cloud business application. In addition, it offers SAP Fiori, an user experience interface; SAP SuccessFactors Human Capital Management solutions that help organizations enhance the value of their workforce; SAP Fieldglass, a cloud-based application for external workforce management and services procurement; SAP Ariba, an online business-to-business marketplace; and SAP Concur, a travel and expense management software. Further, the company provides SAP MaxAttention to turn ideas into value-based predictable outcomes; and SAP ActiveAttention program to support smaller businesses. Additionally, it offers SAP Enterprise Support services that provides proactive, predictive, and preventive support for customers across hybrid landscapes; and SAP Preferred Success, which provides prescriptive customer success activities for accelerated cloud adoption. SAP SE has strategic alliance with NTT Corporation. SAP SE was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Walldorf, Germany.

SAPN.MX.summary: SAP SE operates as an enterprise application software, and analytics and business intelligence company worldwide. The company operates through three segments: Applications, Technology & Services; SAP Business Network; and Customer Experience. SHF.DE.summary: SNP Schneider-Neureither & Partner SE provides software products and software-related consulting services worldwide. It operates through two segments, Services and Software. The Services segment offers consulting and training services, such as traditional SAP consulting and implementation, as well as hosting, cloud, and application management services. The Software segment provides CrystalBridge, a data transformation platform for the analysis, planning, and implementation of IT data transformations in an enterprise resource planning environment. This segment also licenses and sells software, as well as offers maintenance services, including software updates, upgrades and enhancements, and technical product support services. SNP Schneider-Neureither & Partner SE has a strategic partnership with Scheer GmbH. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Heidelberg, Germany.

SJJ.DE.summary: Serviceware SE provides a portfolio of software solutions for the digitalization and automation of service processes in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, and internationally. The company offers enterprise service management platform, which includes anafee, a software tool for the financial management; helpline, a service management solution; Careware, a mobile and field service solution; Sabio, a knowledge management solution; and cubus, an integrated corporate planning software. It also provides IT infrastructure, software licensing, maintenance, and other services. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Bad Camberg, Germany.

SJJ.F.summary: Serviceware SE provides a portfolio of software solutions for the digitalization and automation of service processes in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, and internationally. TBX.F.summary: tick Trading Software AG, a software company,  provides solutions for professional trading of various asset classes worldwide. Its core product is TradeBase MX Platform, a trading system that controls message routing, manages user access rights, distributes market data, and connects trading interfaces. It also provides e-Trading Compliance Monitor, a system designed to act as a standalone hub to merge the order flow of multiple trading applications into one single unified order pool; and the tick-TS Cloud solution. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in DÃ¼sseldorf, Germany.

TMV.DE.summary: TeamViewer AG, together with its subsidiaries, develops and distributes remote connectivity solutions worldwide. The company's products include TeamViewer that helps to remotely connect to desktop computers, mobile devices, and Internet of Things (IoT) devices from anywhere at any time; TeamViewer Tensor, a cloud-based enterprise connectivity platform, which enables large-scale IT management framework deployments; TeamViewer Pilot that enhances remote support with augmented reality; and TeamViewer IoT, which enables to instantly connect, monitor, and operate machines and devices securely from anywhere. Its products also comprise TeamViewer Remote Management that manages, monitors, tracks, patches, and protects computers, devices, and software from a single platform; TeamViewer Servicecamp, a solution for service desk management and remote connectivity; and Blizz, a collaboration and online communication product that enables various remote workplace interaction use cases, including audio and video conferencing, instant messaging, and screen sharing across various devices with up to 300 concurrent participants. The company was formerly known as Regit Beteiligungs-GmbH and changed its name to TeamViewer AG in September 2019. TeamViewer AG was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in GÃ¶ppingen, Germany. TeamViewer AG is a subsidiary of TigerLuxOne S.Ã  r.l.

TR9.DE.summary: OTRS AG, together with its subsidiaries, provides OTRS service management software. The company offers OTRS, a ticket and process management system that allows service management professionals in any industry to keep pace with today's results-driven business environment; Storm, a cyber-security management software; and Control, a solution to implement an ISMS systems. It also provides OTRS On-Premise solution and service desk software. The company offers its OTRS products in 40 different languages worldwide. OTRS AG was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Oberursel, Germany.

V3S.DE.summary: Vectron Systems AG manufactures, sells, and installs intelligent POS systems and communication software for the networking of branch shops worldwide. It offers stationary and mobile POS systems; POS PC, a POS system software; Vectron Commander, a software for networks and centralized data management; Vectron Journal Tool, a tool for evaluating, archiving and analyzing the POS system journal data; Vectron Contacts, a contact and invoice manager software; and Vectron Analytics, a software for analyzing sales data and displaying the key performance indicators in graphic overview. The company also provides hardware connection peripherals, including cash management systems, printers, stands, pagers, scanners, drink dispensers and coffee machines, scales, and payment systems. In addition, it provides trade solutions for hospitality, gastronomy, hotels, bakeries, and cafÃ©s; cloud-based myVectron reporting app; and bonVito, an online service with customer retention, loyalty program, bonus cards, and various other functions. The company sells its products through a network of dealers and sales team. Vectron Systems AG was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in MÃ¼nster, Germany.

VRL.DE.summary: Black Pearl Digital AG provides software development and consulting services for the blockchain industry. It offers ICO and STO management services and blockchain workshop services. The company also provides SecurePearl Wallet, a cryptocurrency wallet that enables asset managers to buy, sell, and store various digital assets and cryptocurrencies. In addition, it offers consulting and financing services for high-growth enterprises in an early stage of its corporate development cycle. The company was formerly known as Victoria Real AG and changed its name to Black Pearl Digital AG in March 2018. Black Pearl Digital AG is based in Munich, Germany.

WCAGY.summary: Wirecard AG, a technology company, provides outsourcing and white label solutions for electronic payments worldwide. The company operates in three segments: Payment Processing & Risk Management, Acquiring & Issuing, and Call Center & Communication Services. The Payment Processing & Risk Management segment offers products and service for the acceptance or transactions, and the processing of electronic payments and associated processes. The Acquiring & Issuing segment provides settlement services for credit card sales for online and terminal payments, as well as current accounts with prepaid cards and Girocard/Maestro debit cards; processes payment transactions in various currencies; and issues prepaid and debit cards to private and business customers. The Call Center & Communication Services segment offers value added services, aftersales services to customers, and mailing services. The company also provides payment processing solutions that include Wirecard Payment Page, a payment page; credit card processing; direct debit; online banking payment; alternative payment; international payment processing; tokenization; point of sale terminals; and Wirecard Checkout Portal, a payment portal. In addition, it offers mobile payment solutions; risk management solutions, such as fraud prevention, credit worthiness checks, and individual solutions; integration and testing solutions, including enterprise integration, transaction testing, payment hub, customer self-select PIN, and secure mailer solutions; and communication services. The company serves the consumer goods, digital goods, and travel and mobility sectors. Wirecard has strategic partnerships with Poynt, CreditPilot PLC, SunExpress, and Emonvia. Wirecard AG was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Aschheim, Germany.
